text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu ʿaduwwi waʿaduwwakum awliyaa tul'quna ilayhim bil-mawadati waqad kafaru bima jaakum mina l-haqi yukh'rijuna l-rasula wa-iyyakum an tu'minu bil-lahi rabbikum in kuntum kharajtum jihadan fi sabili wa-ib'tighaa mardati tusirruna ilayhim bil-mawadati wa-ana aʿlamu bima akhfaytum wama aʿlantum waman yafʿalhu minkum faqad dalla sawaa l-sabili
